lines.text: "Daddy, are you sure this is right?"

[shy laugh, covering her mouth]
You're sick.
How come you always do that? How come you always cover your mouth when you smile? You got bad teeth or somethin'?
Eight, eight, the burning hate. Between Sunday and Monday there lies a day so dark it will devastate.
Look, if you want to torture me, spank me, lick me, do it. But if this poetry shit continues, shoot me now, please.

[has the Madam captive]
Now - everybody throw down your guns or I scrape off all her make up!
[considers the Madam's face]
This might take a really long time.
[to Tank Girl and Jet Girl]
Okay, we're gonna give you babes a chance to prove yourselves. Call it an initiation.
You fail, you die!
Yeah, but first, you gotta strip.
That's not in the plan.
Why not?

[locked in a meat freezer, wearing nothing but a straitjacket]
It's... really... hard for me... to play with myself in this thing.
Fuck me!
How many times do I have to tell you, I don't want to!
[shoots him]
[last lines]
I took the bullets out of their guns. That was smart, huh?
Booga, that was very smart.
Wanna dance?
I don't know how.
It's okay, I brought condoms!
Look, it's been swell, but the swelling's gone down.
You see, this tank isn't... isn't...
What? Just one little adjective and we'll have a *whole* sentance. Isn't, glad, sad... mad... Lonely...
Isn't... Operational.

[seizes Jet by the throat]
How do I know you're not lying?

[choking]
Because if, if I was lying, your lungs would be full of cyanide gas.
[Tank releases her]
Cool! So we get a new tank.

Now here's the situation. This bird has got no electrical and in about two minutes we're going to be kissing gravel, so listen to me you sperm sucker! Either you get off your butt and clear us for landing or I'm gonna fly this rocket right up your socket!

[mockingly]
That cut looks painful.
I *like* pain.
What else do you like?
Hot oil. Vacuum attachments. Yup. Hey, which of you gorgeous guys would like an oil change, hmm?
[the Soldier starts to get up]
Don't be stupid, she's gonna...
[the Soldier shakes him off]
...bite it off.

[stands in front of her and puts his gun to her head]
The moment I feel teeth, you feel lead.
[He unzips his pants, she does nothing]
Well? What are you waiting for?
I'm gonna need a microscope and tweezers, it's like, uh...
[furious, the Soldier knees her in the face, while the others laugh and snicker]
Whoa... you're gonna have to stop this... you're really getting me hot.
[the soldier kneels down and tries to rape her, but she raises both legs and wrenches his neck with her boots, killing him instantly; all the soldiers yell "FREEZE!" and train their guns in her face]
...What?
[first lines]

Listen up, cause I'm only telling you this once. I'm not bedtime story lady, so pay attention. It's 2033. The world is *screwed* now. You see, a while ago this humongous comet came crashing into the earth. Bam, total devastation. End of the world as we know it. No celebrities, no cable TV, no water. It hasn't rained in 11 years. Now 20 people gotta squeeze inside the same bathtub - so it ain't all bad.
I was a dog, but because I was really good, they moved me up to human being status.
[Looks down his mutant body]
Ehh... sort of.

[shakes fists around]
Oh I'm so pretty!
[continues shaking fists and begins to dance from foot to foot]
Oh, I'm gonna hit you so hard, your children will be born bruised!
All the king's horses and all the king's men... wish they had the technology I have.
You take the tank!
[rock music starts]
Are you sure?
[looking at a girl on the tv screen in the dressing room]
I can get you out!
Who'd you use to be?
A cop.
Figures.
The Rippers are a demonic army of bloodthirsty, human eating, purse snatchin', mutant creatures.

[spits in captor's face]
There's your water...
The pipe. You're gonna really love this one. It goes down 40 meters.
[throws a marble down the pipe]
It gets smaller and smaller the deeper you go.
Sounds wicked. Can I go first?
Lock up your sons!
I'm too young for this shit!
How much did they pay you to spy on us?
Two dollars and fifteen cents!
Feeling a little inadequate?
What the hell is that?
Sounds like Cole Porter, sir.

[points his gun]
End it!
Sir!
I have two words for you. Brush your teeth!
To the Bat Tank!
I say we kill 'em!
I say we hump 'em.
I say we eat crumpets and tea.
Tasty! Crumpets and tea. All in favor of crumpets and tea, say "Aye."
Aye!
Shut up! Ain't gonna be no crumpets and tea.
My my, she'll be fun to break.
I win.
Yeah, lucky you. Just wait to see what you've won...
Prison, my ass. That's exactly what they want us to think.
Or better yet, that isn't what they want us to think, that way we'll think what they think we might think, but actually...
Booga.
Huh?
Try not to speak.
Reach for the sky gods!
The code will be... "on the road." Yeah...
He's Jack Kerouac incarnate.
[to old-ish man]
You are so pretty it makes me sick.
